description: A method of collecting and storing rainwater from rooftops to reduce dependence on borewell water.
steps: Collect rainwater from the roof using gutters connected to a pipe.
Divert the first rainwater to remove dust using a first flush system.
Pass the water through a sand, gravel, and charcoal filter.
Store the filtered water in an underground tank with a tight lid.
Clean the roof before the monsoon season and wash the filter regularly.
risks: Contamination of water if filters are not maintained.
Potential overflow of the storage tank during heavy rains.
